name: Daily Upload Dir
author: Ulf Benjaminsson

sections.description:
Note: This plugin has been superseded by the much improved Custom Upload Dir.

Daily Upload Dir will:

  1. add a daily subdirectory to your upload path
  2. use the current post’s date instead of the current date. (eg: adding files to a post from 2003-03-23 will put the files in /uploads/2003/03/23)

sections.installation:
1. Extract wp-daily_upload_dir.php and transfer it to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Turn on “Organize my uploads into month- and year-based folders” in Miscellaneous Options.

short_description: Organizes your uploads into year, month and day-based folders. Uses the post's timestamp when creating dirs.
